APPID.NAME: chromeurltitle
APPID.TITLE: Chrome URL & Title Retrieval
APPID.DESC: a chrome extension & local Python listener for getting a URL and title out of the web browser

CONFIG.NAME: outputdir
CONFIG.TITLE: Output Directory
CONFIG.DESC: full folder path, to a folder that received links will be output to

CONFIG.NAME: outputfile
CONFIG.TITLE: Output File
CONFIG.DESC: name of the output file, that will contain the JSON link data

CONFIG.NAME: lockstephostip
CONFIG.TITLE: Lockstep Host IP Address
CONFIG.DESC: IP address for the lockstep host; received entries are output one at a time

CONFIG.NAME: lockstephostport
CONFIG.TITLE: Lockstep Host Port
CONFIG.DESC: Port for the lockstep host; received entries are output one at a time
CONFIG.$comment: this is wrong; fix 9999 to the right default value

CONFIG.NAME: threaddelay
CONFIG.TITLE: Thread Delay
CONFIG.DESC: How long the thread waits, in deciseconds, before checking if it is time to post a link
